mapper.sql: SELECT t1.APIAPPID, t1.APIAPPSECRET, t1.APITOKEN, t1.APIURL, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.ORGID, t11.ORGNAME, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALIDFLAG, t1.WXACCOUNTID, t1.WXACCOUNTNAME FROM T_SRFWXACCOUNT t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t11 ON t1.ORGID = t11.ORGID

SELECT t1.`APIAPPID`, t1.`APIAPPSECRET`, t1.`APITOKEN`, t1.`APIURL`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`ORGID`, t11.`ORGNAME`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`WXACCOUNTID`, t1.`WXACCOUNTNAME` FROM `T_WXACCOUNT` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORG t11 ON t1.ORGID = t11.ORGID

SELECT t1.APIAPPID, t1.APIAPPSECRET, t1.APITOKEN, t1.APIURL, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.ORGID, t11.ORGNAME, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALIDFLAG, t1.WXACCOUNTID, t1.WXACCOUNTNAME FROM T_WXACCOUNT t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORG t11 ON t1.ORGID = t11.ORGID

SELECT t1.APIAPPID, t1.APIAPPSECRET, t1.APITOKEN, t1.APIURL, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.ORGID, t11.ORGNAME, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALIDFLAG, t1.WXACCOUNTID, t1.WXACCOUNTNAME FROM T_SRFWXACCOUNT t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t11 ON t1.ORGID = t11.ORGID

SELECT t1.APIAPPID, t1.APIAPPSECRET, t1.APITOKEN, t1.APIURL, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.ORGID, t11.ORGNAME, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALIDFLAG, t1.WXACCOUNTID, t1.WXACCOUNTNAME FROM T_SRFWXACCOUNT t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t11 ON t1.ORGID = t11.ORGID

SELECT t1.[APIAPPID], t1.[APIAPPSECRET], t1.[APITOKEN], t1.[APIURL], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[MEMO], t1.[ORGID], t11.[ORGNAME], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t1.[RESERVER3], t1.[RESERVER4], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[VALIDFLAG], t1.[WXACCOUNTID], t1.[WXACCOUNTNAME] FROM [T_SRFWXACCOUNT] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t11 ON t1.ORGID = t11.ORGID
